nodes.text: Sherro was a Human male Corellian who lived on the planet Corellia during the Cold War between the Galactic Republic and the Sith Empire. During the Battle of Corellia, at which time Sherro led a resistance cell against the Imperial occupation. Havoc Squad linked up Sherro's cell with Hendrick's and Oudon's, and the group set up an ambush in a factory in the Labor Valley that wiped out a large number of Imperials.
